about_the_game:
Survive the Chaos, Master the Synergies, and Build Your Emoji Empire

Clash of Emojis is a turn-based strategy game that combines fast decision-making, clever planning, and a touch of luck. Dive into a world where every move matters, and each round brings new challenges, rewards, and opportunities for strategic mastery. With hundreds of unique emojis to unlock and evolve, your journey will be one of discovery, survival, and creativity.

Gameplay Highlights

Implemented Features (Available in Early Access):

  • Emoji Synergies: Every emoji has a purpose, but their true power lies in discovering hidden synergies. Combine emojis to unleash devastating effects or unexpected bonuses that can turn the tide of any round.

  • Strategic Gameplay: Engage in risk-reward decision-making by managing good and bad emojis, balancing health, and surviving through progressively challenging rounds.

  • Core Turn-Based Mechanics: Experience a fast-paced, 45-second decision-making process each turn, where players must strategically place emojis to minimize penalties and maximize benefits.

  • Challenging Round Progression: Survive 25 rounds while managing health, effects, and emoji synergies. Rounds progressively increase in difficulty, introducing new challenges.

Work In Progress (Planned Features):

  • Dynamic Environments: From blazing deserts to icy tundras, every environment will introduce unique challenges and opportunities, evolving gameplay strategies.

  • Perk System: Build your strategy with a deep and rewarding perk system, allowing you to customize gameplay by creating powerful combos, negating penalties, or enhancing your favorite emojis.

  • Achievements and Rewards: Test your skills with a variety of achievements that unlock exclusive rewards, celebrating your mastery and progression in the game.

  • Cosmetic Customization: Unlock a wide range of emoji skins and visual effects to make your collection truly unique and showcase your personality.

  • New Game Modes: Break free from routine gameplay with fresh game modes, offering innovative twists on core mechanics and introducing new challenges.

  • Expanded Emoji Arsenal: Unlock themed emoji packs with every update, featuring new effects, mechanics, and strategies to explore and master.

Future Updates

Player feedback will play a critical role in shaping the game. Planned updates include enhancements to the core gameplay loop, additional content, and further balancing to refine the overall experience.

Do You Have What It Takes to Survive?

With 25 rounds of increasing chaos, you’ll need quick wits and careful planning to make it through. Unlock perks, adapt to unpredictable environments, and master the art of emoji synergy to come out on top. Every decision counts, and the stakes only get higher as you progress.
detailed_description:
Join Our Discord and Shape the Future of Clash of Emojis!

The community is at the heart of Clash of Emojis, and your input will help shape the game’s evolution. Whether it’s sharing feedback, testing new updates, or pitching creative ideas for emojis, synergies, and mechanics, your voice matters! Join our Discord to take part in discussions, report bugs, and guide the game’s direction through polls and Q&A sessions. Plus, as a thank you for your support, you’ll have the chance to earn free gamemode keys by actively participating and helping us refine the experience. Let’s build something amazing—together!

NOTE: Steam no longer allows links in discrption so please use discord code - pA3NCzeY to join, thanks! 


Support the Future of Clash of Emojis

Clash of Emojis is a passion project created by a solo developer, but building and maintaining a free-to-play game comes with its challenges. Your support can help take this game to the next level, ensuring it continues to grow and improve.

Here’s how your contributions make a difference:

  • Maintain Essential Services: Keep the game free to play by supporting servers, updates, and ongoing maintenance.

  • Hire Artists and Designers: Bring in talented artists and designers to enhance the visuals, create stunning emoji skins, and improve the overall look and feel of the game.

  • Add More Content: Fund the development of new emoji packs, game modes, and environments to keep the experience fresh and engaging.

  • Elevate the Experience: Help polish the game, making it smoother, more exciting, and even more fun for everyone.

With your help, Clash of Emojis can reach its full potential, delivering a better experience for players around the world. If you love the game and want to see it grow, consider supporting its development. Together, we can create something truly amazing!

  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A strategy game that challenges you to unlock and master unique emojis, create powerful synergies, and adapt to ever-changing environments. With evolving perks, new game modes, and cosmetics, every decision shapes your survival in this chaotic and unpredictable adventure.
